projects.title: Chat App
projects.description: This project is based on a real-time chat app.It was developed using Socket.io, using React for creating the front and using Nodejs for the backend of the application, for the styling and responsiveness used Bootstrap5 and CSS.

projects.title: Payment application
projects.description: This project is based on accept payment using razorpay integration

projects.title: Product Management
projects.description: The basic idea of this project that working of backend development of E-commerce website like amazon and flipkart.In this project need to store and manage four collections in database i.e. Users,Products,Carts and Orders. Here database has used for storing the data is mongodb-atlas .

projects.title: URL Shorten
projects.description: This shortened url use because easy to share,error free,readable and take less space to share with messaging platforms...just like real life example Tinyurl, Bitly etc.As the backend of this site need create the schema(structure) of document of data.

projects.title: Book management
projects.description: The website where read the book and can give the review of a particular book. just like real life example:kindle-books. As a developer(backend) of this site i need to store the collection of of users, books that added by them as well as reviewers data of a particular book in DataBase

projects.title: Open-to-Intern

projects.title: Blog Project
projects.description: This project is based on blogging site, how the complete data get to be create,organize and update in DB.On depends on query of client side send to server to perform CRUD operation and give better understanding and information regarding working environment of backend of a blogging site like Quora.
